trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service volume containers page to modify a volume container.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service volume containers page to modify a volume container.

trans-unit.source: On the Devices page, select the device, double-click it, and then click the Volume containers tab.
trans-unit.target: On the Devices page, select the device, double-click it, and then click the Volume containers tab.

trans-unit.source: In the tabular listing of the volume containers, select the setting that you want to modify, and click Modify.
trans-unit.target: In the tabular listing of the volume containers, select the setting that you want to modify, and click Modify.

trans-unit.source: In the Modify Volume container dialog box, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Modify Volume container dialog box, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Change the name of the volume container, modify the associated bandwidth, and specify whether or not the data residing in the cloud needs to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Change the name of the volume container, modify the associated bandwidth, and specify whether or not the data residing in the cloud needs to be encrypted.

trans-unit.source: The encryption key and storage account cannot be changed after they are specified.
trans-unit.target: The encryption key and storage account cannot be changed after they are specified.

trans-unit.source: If you specified Select a bandwidth template, click the arrow to proceed to the next page.
trans-unit.target: If you specified Select a bandwidth template, click the arrow to proceed to the next page.

trans-unit.source: In the next page of the Modify Volume Container dialog box:
trans-unit.target: In the next page of the Modify Volume Container dialog box:

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, choose an existing bandwidth template.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, choose an existing bandwidth template.

trans-unit.source: Review the schedule settings for the specified bandwidth template.
trans-unit.target: Review the schedule settings for the specified bandwidth template.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to save the updated settings.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to save the updated settings.

trans-unit.source: The Volume containers page will be updated to reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: The Volume containers page will be updated to reflect the changes.
